title: Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Instructional Design: Cognitive Presence Enhancement and Learning Outcomes via the SOP2 Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts and their application in professional settings
context.additional_context: Case-based learning activities emphasizing job relevance for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve cognitive engagement by 40%+ during complex mathematical problem-solving processes using the SOP2 model phases
Learners enhance integrated application skills between mathematical concepts by 25% compared to pre-assessment through online discussions and two-stage presentations

Learners analyze at least 10 math problems reflecting real job scenarios (e.g., process optimization, inventory management) in a VR simulation environment and solve them with over 80% accuracy by applying at least three provided strategies (e.g., linear programming, probabilistic modeling, data analysis).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
